description.S1: Tell Hortense the results of your investigation

blurb.B1: Return to Hortense and deliver the news.
blurb.B2: You can either tell her the truth about the Early Retirement Program
blurb.B3: and then Persuade (100) or Intimidate (65) her into rewarding you more bits.
blurb.B4: One can also Lie (40) to her that the Retirement District is a paradise and encourage her to see for herself,
blurb.B5: with predictable consequences (gains Board positive reputation).

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: I must admit, I'm getting a certain thrill out of our little arrangement. If this goes well, perhaps I'll start hiring wandering delinquents to handle all of my affairs.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: It is going well, I hope?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The Retirement District is a paradise. You should see for yourself.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So it turns out Early Retirement isn't so much a life of luxury as it is a brutal execution.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I should go.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: I knew it! I just knew it! What a disaster. Did you get a good look around? What was it like?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: An endless, extravagant garden. There were even signs that said "no frolicking."

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It was just one giant party. They had a vodka fountain and everything.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Everything is gold. Golden streets, golden chairs, golden toothbrushes...

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Truly? That's... why that's the most beautiful thing I've ever heard.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: I can't believe they kept this from us. From me! The nerve! The audacity!

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Here, take your payment. I have to fetch my things. I don't care what I have to do - they'll give me luxury or give me death!

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: A fountain of it? I bet it's Spectrum Ultraviolet too. Disgraceful! I can't find one bottle of it and they get a whole fountain.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Toothbrushes? Why that is positively gaudy... I must have one!

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: What? You mean it's just a sham they perpetuate so they can... dispose of the rabble? That's... that's...

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Brilliant! To take the most burdensome members of our society and simply remove them... oh, I'll never doubt the wisdom of the Board again.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Why I had no reason to be envious at all. What a relief!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I really should have expected this reaction.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Well I'm happy you're happy, I guess.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I was pretty relieved myself. I love killing me some automechanicals.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: And how else would I react? A vagrant such as yourself couldn't possibly appreciate the emotional burden this news has lifted from my shoulders.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: But regardless of your ignorance, I promised you a fee for your services, so a fee you shall have.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Just pay what we settled on and we'll be copacetic.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Forget it. It wouldn't feel right to get paid for something like this.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Of course, as we agreed. I'm not one to break a contract.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: In any event, while I'm deeply grateful for the peace of mind you've brought me, I will need some solitude to fully bask in it. So if there's nothing further...

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: What, because of the violence? They were just automechanicals. But suit yourself, I suppose.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Just as any professional should be, even if your profession is "violently inclined vagrant."

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now then, to the matter of your fee.

dialog.speaker: HortenseIngalsbe (Female)
dialog.utterance: You would, wouldn't you, you precious little pauper?
